name: Hotel Gramont Opera Paris

reviews.text: This is a super hotel! The rooms are smallish but well presented. The buffet breakfast is more than adequate. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. Add to this a great location (10 minutes to le louvre) and you have great package.
reviews.title: This is a super hotel! The rooms are...

reviews.text: We have just come back from a brief trip to Paris and had an excellent 2 nights at the Hotel Gramont Opera. I travelled with my parents, wife and 2 year old son and we all comfortably fitted in a Quadruple room. We were pleasantly surprised to find 2 bathrooms in our room plus it was extremely quiet given the hotel's prime location. All staff were outstanding and special mention must be given to Sandra who was a real superstar catering for our every request. I wholeheartedly recommend the hotel and will definitely look to stay there again in our future visits to Paris.
reviews.title: Great Paris hotel, ideal for young families

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel very close to all attractions and metro line. An abundance of bars, restaurants and entertainment within 5 mins walking. Very friendly staff - rooms were very clean and comfortable - if not just a little small. Breakfast was great and not to be missed. If coming back to Paris would definitely use this hotel again it was excellent value for money.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel in the centre of Paris

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 2 nights at the end of August.
reviews.title: A beatiful hotel with superb staff.

reviews.text: I had chosen this hotel purely based on reading Tripadvisor reviews and I was not disappointed.
reviews.title: Je t'aime Hotel Gramont Opera!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Gramont Hotel is on a quiet side street, but near to main street and Opera house. Near to stores and shopping places.
reviews.title: Unexpected nice place !!!

reviews.text: The room size was not large but very cozy and clean.
reviews.title: Great hotel on a quieter side street

reviews.text: The front desk staff was very nice and friendly can speak perfect English(most important thing in paris).
reviews.title: The only place I would want to stay when in Paris again

reviews.text: I will stay again at this Hotel In definitely.
reviews.title: Amazing Hotel

reviews.text: Thank you ohharry!
reviews.title: Lovely hotel, fantastic staff, excellent location.

reviews.text: I stayed here with my husband, 12 year old and 9 year old. We had just 1 night here and found it to be a terrific hotel in a superb location. Service before and after we arrived was first rate. Quadruple room was just what we needed and was quiet for a good nights sleep. The location of this hotel is excellent - very well placed for Palais Garnier, Galleries Lafayette, Blds des Italiens and Hausmann and for further afield various metro stations are just round the corner. Walk down Rue Gramont to the end where it meets Bld des Italiens and catch sight of the Sacre Coeur in the distance - a truely wonderful sight. Would really recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Great location, superb service

reviews.text: I stayed in the above hotel with my wife and son for 8 nights in a triple room and we are very satisfied with our selection based on reviews from Trip Advisor.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT HOTEL TO EXPLORE PARIS

reviews.text: The room was just adequate for 3 but clean, recently renovated,nicely decorated.The greatest advantage of the hotel is the quality of service of the staff who were always kind and helpful and the location which is really great ,very near to metro stations,supermarkets,restaurants and big stores.
reviews.title: Nice room, great location

reviews.text: Highly recommended to anybody visiting Paris!
reviews.title: Satisfactory hotel at a good location, with a good offer price.

reviews.text: Nice room, great location, great value for money. I have stayed there twice this month and have been happy with the service and the room. I will go back there again. Just don't bother taking the shuttle bus, it's a pain if you can afford 50 euro for a cab fare. Too many stops to get to the hotel if you're arriving at night. The daytime staff is very helpful, some night time staff are not.
reviews.title: Sting in the tail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose this hotel from other Trip Advisor reviews - they were spot on, This is an excellent small well placed hotel in central Paris. We explored most of Paris over 3 days and the hotel Gramont was perfect. The hotel has recently been renovated and is staffed by very helpfull reception staff.
reviews.title: A perfect, recently renovated, ideally located, small hotel for exploring Paris.

reviews.text: Really helpful friendly staff, nice clean modern room with A/C. Frig, TV, internet! wine and drinks available downstairs, cafe and bakery around the corner. A bit awkward for metro connections, the Opera station is huge. Be prepared to walk a lot, which is fun in Paris anyway.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, nice hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and myself had a very comfortable 3 night stay at the Gramont Opera. The room was a little small but I guess it is typical for a Paris hotel. I would like to mention that the hotel is in a great location, spotless and the staff was very accommodating. At one point while attempting to park my rental car on the street the young man behind the desk walked out to help me navigate the payment kiosk its a bizarre method of payment but that's another story.
reviews.title: Fantastic staff and comfortable stay

reviews.text: I noticed in some of the reviews there was problems with noise from adjacent rooms but in our stay we were not disturbed at all. Maybe it was all the wine we enjoyed at lunch and dinner
reviews.title: This charming hotel was all we could have wished for, and more!

reviews.text: Anyway kudos to whomever trained the staff, they couldn't do enough for us. Will definitely stay there again.
reviews.title: Fantastic staff and great location

description: The hotel Gramont is located 10 minutes walking distance from the opera garnier and the famous shops as Printemps and Galeries Lafayette. The hotel was entire renovated in 2009. This small boutique hotel has a bar in the lobby, a breakfast room in the basement and everywhere free wireless access. All rooms are very nice decorated with two different themes of colors and provide, TV satellite, safe, ac, hair dryer and desk.We offer to our guests a warm family atmosphere and a personal service.
